scripts.lint: npm run lint:tsc && npm run lint:eslint
scripts.repoLatestTag: git describe --tags --abbrev=0 2> /dev/null || npm pkg get version | sed 's/"//g'
scripts.generateEnv: echo 'NEXT_PUBLIC_BUILD_VERSION='$(npm run -s generateVersion) > .env.local && echo 'NEXT_PUBLIC_BUILD_ID='$(npm run -s generateBuildId) >> .env.local
scripts.docker:tagname: echo $(npm run -s repoLatestTag)-dev-$(npm run -s generateBuildId)-$(npm run -s repoStatus)
scripts.docker:build: npm run generateEnv && docker build -t $(npm run -s docker:imagename):$(npm run -s docker:tagname) -f ./dockerfile .
scripts.docker:run:
docker run --rm -e 'PORT=3000' -p 3000:3000 -d --name $(npm run -s docker:imagename) $(npm run -s docker:imagename):$(npm run -s docker:tagname) && echo '
Go to http://localhost:3000'
